thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: U.S. Tariffs to Be in Spotlight at G-20 Summit

author: Josh Zumbrun
title: U.S. Tariffs to Be in Spotlight at G-20 Summit
text:
Global finance ministers meeting this week in Buenos Aires were planning to focus on topics like the workforce in an age of automation and how to boost infrastructure investment. Instead, their attention has turned to U.S. tariffs on steel and aluminum.
Finance ministers and central bankers are meeting under the auspices of the Group of 20 summit, a gathering of leaders who represent 80% of the worldâ€™s economy.
The...
